law.catch_line: Availability of range facilities for retired peace officers.

text.section:
The following agencies of the Commonwealth shall make range facilities available not less than four (4) days per year for firearms qualification by retired peace officers seeking certification pursuant to the provisions of KRS 237.138 to 237.142:
The Justice and Public Safety Cabinet;
The Department of Military Affairs; and
The Department of Fish and Wildlife Resources.

Firearms qualification may be conducted at any location, public or private, at which a handgun may be safely fired. The safety of the location at which firing takes place shall be the responsibility of the instructor conducting the qualification.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 271, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 13, effective March 31, 2005.
